item.title: New Article on Medium - Active Reading with Children
item.description:
Active Reading with Children Update on Current Creative Projects
Lots of what most people would consider as their "Parenting Style" is subjective. It's typically defined by how you and your spouse/co-parent were raised, the challenges and competencies of each of your children, and research. Thankfully one thing most every parent on planet earth agrees with is that reading to your children is fundamental.
Taking the time each day to sit down with your little ones and read is truly priceless.

item.description:
